what_content: Think of XCM as the fuel in the CoinMetro ecosystem. Much like loyalty points, you can get rewarded in XCM for different actions such as staking, referring new traders or locking XCM.
limited_content: The big difference? We donâ€™t just keep minting or creating new points. There is a limited supply and an active secondary market. This means that people are trading XCM tokens back and forth all the time and this accessible market for XCM means not only do the tokens have a real cash value but that the value can increase overtime.
